description.value: You might have been an actor, a dancer, a musician, a street magician, or any other sort of performer. Adventuring offers new audiences and new material and every narrow escape is another dramatic moment for future performances. Skills: Perform 2, Persuasion 2, Acrobatics 1, Perception 1, +40 XP Equipment: Basic musical instrument, common clothes, disguise kit, shoes Feature - By Popular Demand: You can find performance venues and earn money entertaining in most settlements.
